title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync message when overwriting jar file in the same directory
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync message when overwriting jar file in the same directory
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar file in the same directory, if you overwrite the exported jar file a second time, you will receive an out of sync message.
EB: The JarExporter should allow overwriting the exported jar file in the same directory without causing an out of sync message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Export a directory (project) using JarExporter.
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory.
3. Overwrite the exported jar file.
4. Observe the out of sync message.
